EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - Claim Incomplete
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
You submitted an incomplete claim. Please provide below information in the next 14 days to avoid claim denial.
[ ] Pictures needed [ ] Failure description [ ] Aircraft information (tail number and/or serial number) not found [ ] Part number not found [ ] Serial number not found [ ] Purchased Material Invoice Copy [ ] HAPP/MPP Contract [ ] Service Bulletin number not found [ ] Other
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
